name: Rajma Chawal with Ghee

instructions: Soak rajma overnight. Pressure cook until soft. In a pan, heat ghee, add cumin, onions, ginger-garlic paste, and saut√©. Add tomatoes and spices, cook until oil separates. Add cooked rajma, simmer for 15 minutes. Serve hot with rice and a dollop of ghee.

name: Chole with Brown Rice
description: Chickpea curry served with healthy brown rice.
instructions: Soak chole overnight. Pressure cook until soft. In a pan, heat oil, add cumin, onions, ginger-garlic paste, and saut√©. Add tomatoes and spices, cook until oil separates. Add cooked chole, simmer for 15 minutes. Serve with brown rice.

name: Matar Paneer with Roti
description: Cottage cheese and peas curry served with whole wheat roti.
instructions: Heat oil, add cumin, onions, ginger-garlic paste, and saut√©. Add tomatoes and spices, cook until oil separates. Add peas and paneer, cook for 10 minutes. Serve hot with roti.

name: Palak Paneer with Jeera Rice
description: Spinach and paneer curry served with cumin-flavored rice.
instructions: Heat oil, add cumin, onions, ginger-garlic paste, and saut√©. Add tomato, cook, then add spinach puree and spices. Add paneer, simmer for 5 minutes. Serve with jeera rice.

name: Butter Chicken with Whole Wheat Naan
description: Classic butter chicken served with fiber-rich whole wheat naan.

name: Fish Curry with Red Rice

name: Mixed Dal with Ghee and Steamed Rice

instructions: Pressure cook dals with turmeric and salt. In a pan, heat ghee, add cumin, onions, tomatoes, and saut√©. Add cooked dal, simmer. Serve with rice and extra ghee.

name: Keema with Paratha

name: Egg Curry with Rice

instructions: Heat oil, add cumin, onions, ginger-garlic paste, and saut√©. Add tomatoes and spices, cook. Add boiled eggs, simmer for 5 minutes. Serve with rice.

name: Aloo-Gobi with Roti and Curd

instructions: Heat oil, add cumin, onions, ginger-garlic paste, and saut√©. Add tomatoes and spices, cook. Add potatoes and cauliflower, cook until tender. Serve with roti and curd.
